item.title: The 15 Best ‘Sex and the City’ Episodes of All Time, Ranked
item.description: As the world waves farewell to Carrie Bradshaw — for good, it seems — with the end of ‘And Just Like That,’ I couldn’t help but wonder… which episodes of ‘Sex and the City’ stand the test of time?

item.title: ‘The Gilded Age’ Director Unpacks Bertha’s Visit, Women’s Suffrage and That Shocking Death
item.description: “I remember jumping in my seat and gasping,” Deborah Kampmeier tells THR of the third-to-last episode of the HBO Max series, which was recently renewed for season four.

item.title: How Did ‘And Just Like That’ Become So Divisive?
item.description: Some can’t help but wonder, was Kim Cattrall right to leave Samantha Jones in the ’00s? THR looks at the missteps being called out by fans of HBO’s ‘Sex and the City’ revival series — and why so many

item.title: Ben Ahlers on Being a ‘Gilded Age’ Tech Bro and His Fashion World Cred (He’s 6-Foot-2!)
item.description: The breakout butler of HBO’s historical hit says “there’s something so inherently theatrical” about playing with style.
